name: Labyrinth of Uno
description:
Part of this year's #extragamejam

Whew it's been a while since I joined a jam, but finally made somethin'.

Goal:

Explore through the maze and defeat enemies  and get gold to get more points. See if you can beat the hi-score! Also, get the relic that's at the end of the maze to respawn more gold... and enemies. You can do it again by getting back from where ya came from!

Controls:

ASWD - Move

E - Flip Camera

Left Mouse - Sword

Right Mouse - Shield

The 3D Engine's created by TheSnidr https://forum.yoyogames.com/index.php?threads/snidrs-model-format-3d-collisions-... - I used the only version available for Game Maker Studio 1.4. If you have GMS1 or GMS2, you could check it out and take it a spin. Note that for now, Snidr's updating the versions only for GMS2.

The 3D Models are done by me.

The Sounds are also done by me, via Bxfr https://www.bfxr.net/

The Music comes from INCOMPETECH
